p: Estimations of potential PrEP users have previously been undertaken in San Francisco [ 30] and nationally in the US [ 31]. According to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention about 24.7% of sexually active adult men who have sex with men in the US were estimated to be eligible for PrEP based on the 2014 US Public Health Service's PrEP clinical practice guidelines [ 7, 31]. This proportion falls within the range we estimated for the proportion of men who have sex with men who would be eligible for PrEP in Australia.
